page.title: 10CRAMOND :My New School
page.content: Yesterday I spent the day at the Royal High School, the secondary school I shall attend after the summer holidays. I am eleven & I look forward to the choice of subjects next year. In the morning the prefects took us to the large Assembly Hall. The Assistant Rector spoke to us. Then we went to the classrooms we shall use next year and met our classmates and teachers. The Maths teacher used green chalk. He supports Hibernian, the local football team.In the science lab we did a simple experiment to see how much energy could be got from a peanut. I think everyone was abit nervous at first but the teachers soon put us at ease and the buildings didn't seem quite as huge as I had imagined, though I am sure that I shall getlost next term. I'll miss my primary school but I am keen to leave it behind too.
